ContentTypePartSettings.Description: Provides a collection behavior for your content item.

ContentPartSettings.Description: Provides an editor for the common properties of a content item.
Provides a way to define custom aliases for content items.
Provides a custom url for your content item.
Provides a way to define the url that is used to render your content item.
Provides a way to add widgets per content items.
Provides a customizable body for your content item.
Provides a collection behavior for your content item.
Turns your content item into a form.
Provides attributes common to all form elements.
Provides attributes common to all input form elements.
Provides label properties.
Provides input field properties.
Provides text area properties.
Provides select field properties.
Provides button properties.
Displays a validation summary.
Displays a field validation error.
Provides an HTML Body for your content item.
Add a list behavior.
Provides a Markdown formatted body for your content item.
Provides a Title for your content item.
Provides a menu link behavior for your content item.
Provides a menu link behavior with the Content Picker for your content item.
Provides a Subtitle for your content item.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: The subtitle of the content item. Set empty to generate it using the pattern.

BooleanFieldSettings.Hint: Control whether to show a widget column

Layers.Name: Always
Layers.Description: The widgets in this layer are displayed on any page of this site.

Layers.Name: Homepage
Layers.Description: The widgets in this layer are only displayed on the homepage.

Layers.Name: NotHomepage
Layers.Description: The widgets in this layer are displayed on all pages except homepage.

Layers.Name: Team Pages
Layers.Description: The team widget displays in this layer.

Layers.Name: Contact Form Pages
Layers.Description: The contact form widget displays in this layer.

Layers.Name: Project Pages
Layers.Description: The widgets in this layer are displayed on all project pages.

Layers.Name: Blog Pages
Layers.Description: The widgets in this layer are displayed on all blog and blog post pages.

Content__LandingPage.Content:
{% assign services = Content["slug:services"] %} {% if services %}

Welcome to Modern Business

{% for service in services.Content.BagPart.ContentItems %}

{{ service.TitlePart.Title }}

{{ service.Service.Excerpt.Text }}

{% assign serviceShape = service | shape_build_display: "Summary" %} {% a display_for: serviceShape.ContentItem, class: "btn btn-primary" %} Learn More {% enda %}
{% endfor %}
{% endif %} {% assign projects = Queries.SearchPortfolio | query %} {% if projects %}

Portfolio Heading

{% for project in projects %}
{% a display_for:project %} {% enda %}

{% a display_for:project %} {{ project.Content.TitlePart.Title }} {% enda %}

{{ project.Content.Project.Excerpt.Html | raw }}

{% endfor %}
{% endif %}

Modern Business Features

The Modern Business template by Start Bootstrap includes:

  • Bootstrap v4
  • jQuery
  • Font Awesome
  • Working contact form with validation
  • Unstyled page elements for easy customization
